messages.subject: Re:Newbie too!
messages.msgSnippet: HI Kim! Welcome to the journey. Life s work is to wake up, to let the things that enter into the circle wake you up rather than put you to sleep. The only way
messages.messageBody:
HI Kim! Welcome to the journey.



"Life's work is to wake up, to let the things that enter into the circle wake you up rather than put you to sleep. The only way to do this is to open, be curious, and develop some sense of sympathy for everything that comes along, to get to know its nature and let it teach you what it will."

Pema Chödrön

messages.subject: Newbie too!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! I am new to this journey and looking foward to growing with you all, as questions arise and expierences present themselves with my children, ages 1 and 3.
messages.messageBody:
Hi! I am new to this journey and looking foward to growing with you
all, as questions arise and expierences present themselves with my
children, ages 1 and 3.

I do have one question: Any good "first" books on unschooling?

Thanks!
Kim
